text: Youren yi zhu de jixiang jiaohui tamen, dan tamen biqi ta, bingqie wangji tamen yiqian suo fan de zui'e; you shui bi tamen hai buyi ne? Wo que yi jiang bomo jia zai tamen de xin shang, yimian tamen liaojie jing yi, bingqie zai tamen de er li zao zhong ting. Ruguo ni zhao tamen yu zhengdao, namo, tamen jiang yong bu zunxun zhengdao.
